concept.title: Use two CVF
concept.shortdesc: myfruit attribute could only be used in note\p tag. platform attribute could be used in any tag.

conbody.pre: platform value is linux within pre tag
conbody.p: platform value is os within p tag
conbody.note: platform value is mswin within note tag
conbody.codeblock: platform value is zos within codeblock tag

p.data: platform value is linux within data tag
p.lq: platform value is os within lq tag
p.xref: platform value is mswin within xref tag
